wikipedia_page.main: Trish Halpin is the editor-in-chief of Marie Claire, who has previously edited Red, More! and New Woman magazines. She has received several awards from the British Society of Magazine Editors, in 2003, 2005, and 2013. Halpin is married, and has twins.

response: Trish Halpin, editor-in-chief of Marie Claire, described Boyd's novel as "[r]iveting – I’m sure this will be my book of the year".
